parameters.label: IR Listen period
parameters.description: Additional time for feedback measurement. Should always be 0.

parameters.label: IR Pulse Width
parameters.description: Adjusts transmit signal so received signal will in average be equal to this values.

parameters.label: Poll / Wake up frequency
parameters.description: Wake device up this many times per second. This value also controls number of measurements per second on mechanical meters

parameters.label: Pulse Threshold Low
parameters.description: Low detection threshold for wheel meters

parameters.label: Pulse Threshold High
parameters.description: High detection threshold for wheel meters

parameters.label: Pulse count
parameters.description: Current pulse count in device (pulse count / pulse factor = kWh)

parameters.label: Keep alive period
parameters.description: How many ticks before going back to sleep in normal wakeup mode.

parameters.label: Real-time mode
parameters.description: Set this to enter real-time mode from remote. Contains seconds * poll frequency before going back to sleep. If you press the button once this value will be set.
